channel.title: CVE Feed for General Electric -- Proficy CIMPLICITY
channel.description: The latest CVEs for General Electric -- Proficy CIMPLICITY

item.title: CVE-2022-21798|2024-09-16T20:42:53.294Z -- general%20electric -- proficy%20cimplicity
item.description: The affected product is vulnerable due to cleartext transmission of credentials seen in the CIMPLICITY network, which can be easily spoofed and used to log in to make operational changes to the system.
